# netboxbgp_prefix_list_rule (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `action` (String) `permit` or `deny`
- `index` (Number)
- `prefix_list` (Number) Reference to foreign ID

### Optional

- `comments` (String)
- `description` (String)
- `ge` (Number)
- `le` (Number)
- `prefix` (Number) Reference to foreign ID
- `prefix_custom` (String)
- `tags` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `created` (String)
- `display` (String)
- `id` (Number) A unique integer value identifying this prefix list rule.
- `last_updated` (String)
